name: Don't cross the line (itch)
description:
Update: fixed some typos in level names.

In this game the player must draw a line from a start point to the goal area without crossing any other lines in the level. The catch is, every time the player starts to draw, everything except their own line will disappear. To succeeds one needs both an excellent memory and a steady hand. The player can, and is advised to stop at few points during a level, to see the obstacles again.  Until they start drawing the next line that is. How few stop can you take to beat a level?

The game has 8 levels of varying difficulty. The game is controlled with a mouse. Please see the in-game tutorial for instructions on how to play.

Credits:
lrdazrl

Sound effect were created using DrPetter's sfxr tool (https://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made for 2 Jams:

Mini Jam 77: CourageTime: April 2nd 2021 at 8:00 AM to April 5th 2021 at 7:00 AM
Theme: Courage
Limitation: Game cannot take place on earth

1-Bit Jam
Time: April 3rd 2021 at 1:00 AM to April 5th 2021 at 1:00 AM
Limitation: 1-Bit (only Black and White pixels)
(secondary) theme: One button

As a result this game was made between April 3rd 2021 at 1:00 AM and April 5th 2021 at 1:00 AM. It is an abstract black & white push-your-luck type of game where instead of luck one must rely on their skill and memory. Everything is controlled with mouse movement and left button clicks.

Note for the 1-Bit Jam:
Uploaded an update with improvements 1 after the deadline. If this should be a problem, please see DontCrossTheLine0.5.zip which contains the previous version.
